question:
Which of the following can issue a writ?
1) Supreme Court
2) District Court
3) Consumer Court
4) High Court
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Supreme Court under Article 32 and High Court under Article 226 of the Constitution can issue writs of habeas corpus, mandamus, prohibition, certiorari and quo-warranto. Moreover, the Parliament under Article 32 can empower any other court to issue these writs.
